name: Delivery Vamp
description:
The deliveryman of a small island was cursed into becoming a vampire and now he needs human blood to live. But he refuses to steal people's blood, so he works for it.

One day, he discovers a legend that if a vampire bathes in the sunlight of the noon for time enough and survives, he will become human again. Will this determined deliveryman succeed in his quest for his humanity?

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Z to transform into bat
  • Space to pause the game

Notes:

  • The producer buildings, where you get the items, are the ones with decorations in front of them. They are: grocery (red street), flower shop (white street), bakery (brown street), blacksmith (gray street), fisher (ship at northwestern edge of the map).
  • The numbers of the houses are 1 to 12, from left to right. The numbers of the producer buildings are skipped.
